title: Historical Events Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of important historical events

questions.question: In what year did the Declaration of Independence get signed?
questions.explanation: The Declaration of Independence was signed on July 4, 1776, marking the American colonies' formal separation from Great Britain.

questions.question: Who was the first human to walk on the moon?
questions.explanation: Neil Armstrong became the first human to walk on the moon on July 20, 1969, during the Apollo 11 mission.

questions.question: When did the Berlin Wall fall?
questions.explanation: The Berlin Wall fell on November 9, 1989, symbolizing the end of the Cold War and the reunification of Germany.

questions.question: What event marked the United States' entry into World War II?
questions.explanation: The Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, prompted the United States to enter World War II.

questions.question: Who delivered the famous 'I Have a Dream' speech?
questions.explanation: Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his iconic 'I Have a Dream' speech during the 1963 March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom.
